text: Hagi ana knazamo'ma ozmahege'za mani'naza vahe'mo'za, kumi'ma hu'naza zankura zamagu'a rukrehera nosu'za, hankromofona9:20 Hankrorema hu'neana, havi avamuku hu'ne.  mono hunonte'za, zamagra'a zamazampinti golire'ene silvare'ene brasire'ene havere'ene, zafa atupare'ene, zmavua onkege zmagesa ontahige kaza osu'za tro hunte'naza zante monora hunte'naze.
